articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Taiwan Activates F-16 Vipers, HF-3 Anti-Ship Missiles, AD Systems To Counter Chinese ‘Punishment Drills’ - EurAsian Times
articles.description: China has launched “punishment” military drills around the self-ruled island of Taiwan just two days after the new Taiwanese president, Lai Ching-te, called on China to “stop threatening Taiwan politically and militarily” on his swearing-in ceremony on May 20…
articles.content: China has launched punishment military drills around the self-ruled island of Taiwan just two days after the new Taiwanese president, Lai Ching-te, called on China to “stop threatening Taiwan politic… [+8592 chars]
